metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Silver Lake Mining Company has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: The Silver Lake Mining Company has sections analyzed in the following keys: B Minor, D Major, A Major,  and B Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
